about_the_game: The Forest is the first chapter in The Last Campfire, the epic puzzling adventure which critics are calling "a perfectly formed experience". Follow in the initial steps of a lost ember trapped in a puzzling place, searching for meaning and a way home. Sample the intimately handcrafted world which Ember finds themselves in and experience the first hints of the increasingly intricate puzzles which they will be faced with.
